title: HSP Sensitivity Test
description: Are you a Highly Sensitive Person? Discover your sensitivity level with 12 questions!

questions.question: How difficult is it to concentrate in a noisy environment?
How quickly do you notice changes in others' moods?
Are you sensitive to bright lights or strong smells?
When watching sad movies or news?

choices.text: Stays with me for a while

questions.question: How do you react to sudden plan changes?
Your sensitivity to caffeine or alcohol?

choices.text: Feel good if I like it

questions.question: When someone around you is angry?

choices.text: Feel as if I'm the angry one

questions.question: Do you notice complex and subtle things?
Mood changes when hungry or tired?

results.title: Steady Mind (Low Sensitivity)
results.description: You have a steady mind that isn't easily shaken by external stimuli. You remain calm under stress and show emotional stability. However, you might sometimes miss subtle emotional cues from others.
results.advice: Sometimes pay more attention to others' feelings. Your stability can be a great comfort to those around you.

results.title: Balanced Sensitivity (Moderate)
results.description: You have balanced sensitivity. You respond flexibly to situations, knowing when to empathize and when to maintain distance. You adapt well to most environments.
results.advice: Your sense of balance is a strength. Cherish your own feelings while maintaining harmony with others.

results.title: Delicate Soul (High Sensitivity)
results.description: You are a Highly Sensitive Person (HSP) with a delicate soul. You notice subtle things others miss and have deep empathy. You have great artistic sensitivity but can easily become overstimulated.
results.advice: Make sure to have recharge time alone. Your sensitivity is an ability to see the world more beautifully.

results.title: Ultra Sensitive (Very High)
results.description: You have very high sensitivity. You deeply feel and experience everything, with exceptional intuition and empathy. Daily stimuli can easily overwhelm you, so self-care is essential.
results.advice: Stimulus management and boundary setting are essential. Your sensitivity is a special gift - protect yourself while using it.
